description: Positive integers r such that A(1,r) = A(2,r - 1) = ... = A(r,1) = 0, where A denotes the function mapping every pair of positive integers (m,n) into 1 if m * 2^(n + 2) + 1 is a prime number dividing F(n + 2) - 2, where F(n) denotes the n-th Fermat number (i.e., F(n) = A000215(n)); and into 0 otherwise.
